original_definition: 'operation mode' means the status of an oven during use;
generated_definition: 'operation mode' means a method of operation, typically used in the context of heating or cooling, in which natural convection is employed to circulate heated or cooled air within a cavity.

Article 2: ‘operation mode’ means the status of anoven during use;
‘conventional mode’ means theoperation modeof anovenonly using natural convection for circulation of heated air inside thecavity of the oven;
‘operation mode’ means the status of an oven during use;
‘conventional mode’ means the operation mode of an oven only using natural convection for circulation of heated air inside the cavity of the oven;
